entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning then north 30 in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 17 February 2023
